name: Single filer at median income
description: Standard case for single person earning €50,000 in the Netherlands

sources.description: Calculated using official 2025 Dutch tax rates and credits from Belastingdienst
sources.notes: Income tax: 35.82% up to €38,441, then 37.48% up to €76,817. General credit phaseout: 6.337% above €28,406. Labour credit: €5,220 + 2.258% of (income - €26,288)
